title: Card: Neutral 01
code:
<gds-flex padding="4xl" margin="auto">
  <gds-card variant="primary" aspect-ratio="16/9" width="240px" justify-content="center" text-align="center"
    align-items="center" gap="s">
    <gds-flex align-items="center" justify-content='center' aspect-ratio="1/1" padding="xs" background="brand-01"
      border-radius="max" color="neutral-03">
      <gds-icon-copy size="l"></gds-icon-copy>
    </gds-flex>
    <gds-text font="detail-book-m">Replace this slot with your content.</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
</gds-flex>
